DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare cardiovascular profile efavirenz rilpivirine , two drug use treat HIV infection .
DOC.brief_title: Efavirenz Versus Rilpivirine Vascular Function , Inflammation , Oxidative Stress
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , open-label , single-center study compare effect efavirenz ( EFV ) versus rilpivirine ( RPV ) endothelial function total 40 HIV-uninfected healthy volunteer ( 20 arm ) Indiana University Medical Center . Enrolled subject brachial artery flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) , measure endothelial function , cardiovascular , inflammatory , oxidative stress parameter measure baseline 4 week study treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year age old 2 . Negative ELISA HIV1 HIV2 screen 3 . Negative hepatitis B surface antigen screen 4 . Negative hepatitis C antibody screen 5 . For woman reproductive potential , negative urine pregnancy test screen willingness use two form birth control course study 6 . For men capable impregnate female sexual partner , willingness use condom spermicidal gel sexual contact course study 7 . No documented history receipt medication use treat psychiatric disorder , include ( limited ) depression , dysthymia , mania , bipolar disease , schizophrenia , previous suicidal ideation/attempts 8 . No anticipated change addition medical therapy course study 9 . No documented history seizure disorder 1 . Inability provide write , inform consent 2 . Known allergy/intolerance rilpivirine , efavirenz , nitroglycerin 3 . Absolute neutrophil count < 750cell/mL screen 4 . Hemoglobin < 11g/dL screen 5 . Platelet count < 100,000/mL screen 6 . Estimated creatinine clearance ( per CockcroftGault equation ) < 55 mL/min screen 7 . Liver transaminase ( AST ALT ) > 100 IU/mL total bilirubin > 1.5mg/dL screen 8 . Serum glucose > 200mg/dL screen 9 . Serum total cholesterol > 190mg/dL screen 10 . Breastfeeding screen course study 11 . Hypotension , define SBP < 90mmHg time main study visit brachial artery ultrasound measurements 12 . Hypertension , define SBP > 160mmHg time screen 13 . Receipt investigational agent within 30 day screen visit anticipate use trial 14 . Receipt cytotoxic chemotherapy within 30 day screen visit anticipate use trial 15 . Receipt systemic glucocorticoid ( > 10mg/day prednisone equivalent ) , inhaled/nasal/topical fluticasone , anabolic steroid within 30 day screen visit anticipate use trial 16 . Use sildenafil ( Viagra Silagra ) , vardenafil ( Levitra ) , tadalafil ( Cialis ) , within 72 hour ( ) brachial artery reactivity test 17 . Indwelling vascular catheter within upper body vessel time brachial artery reactivity test 18 . Active drug alcohol use dependence , opinion investigator study personnel , would interfere adherence study requirement 19 . Acute therapy serious infection serious medical illness ( judgment site investigator ) require systemic treatment and/or hospitalization within 14 day prior screen study visit 20 . History migraine headache 21 . History Raynaud 's phenomenon 22 . History cardiac arrythmias 23 . History hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism untreated ( define TSH outside normal range recent test normal clinical care ) 24 . History carotid bruits 25 . History tobacco use ( cigarette smoking , cigar smoking , chew tobacco ) nicotine replacement treatment ( patch , gum ) within 45 day screen 26 . Drugs/therapies significant CYP 450 induction inhibition potential screen 27 . Use antacid , H2blockers , proton pump inhibitor within 30 day screen anticipated use drug trial 28 . Any history injection illicit drug use 29 . Presence fever , define oral tympanic temperature > 100.3F , either Entry Closeout Visits 30 . On PHQ9 depression questionnaire screening , total score 9 score 0 question 9 .
